999070.name: Zaccaria Pinball - Original Soundtrack
999070.description:
This DLC includes all soundtracks of the remake, deluxe tables and unreleased tracks that not made it to the game.

The DLC will be updated with new tracks every time new tables come out.

Streamers can use these tracks in their live feeds.

Track Format: OGG, Stereo, 48khz.

Track Files Location:

\SteamsteamappscommonZaccaria PinballOST

Track List:
